author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE LATER THIS WEEK IN THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE LATER THIS WEEK IN THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Aug 11 the center of Erin was located near 17.4, -30.3 with movement W at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE LATER THIS WEEK IN THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Aug 11 the center of Erin was located near 17.4, -30.3 with movement W at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
